ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This work was funded by the NSF grant DMS-1616299 (NKV), DMS-1836647 (NKV) and the start-up fund from San Diego State University (NKV). This research was also supported in part by the National Institute on Alcohol Abuse and Alcoholism under grant number 1R01AA022714-01A1, and in part by the Air Force Office of Scientific Research under grant number AFOSR FA9550-15-1-0298.
